current_task.title: Remove Socket.io chat events from server
current_task.description:
Remove the Socket.io chat messaging code from the server. Chat is now handled by Matrix, so the server-side Socket.io chat events are dead code.

Files to modify:
- server/src/signaling/socketHandlers.js

Specific removals:

1. Remove the messageTimestamps rate limiting Map (line 7):
```javascript
// DELETE: const messageTimestamps = new Map();
```

2. Remove the entire 'sendMessage' event handler (lines 274-322):
```javascript
// DELETE: socket.on('sendMessage', ...) block
```

3. Remove the messageTimestamps cleanup in the disconnect handler (line 352):
```javascript
// DELETE: messageTimestamps.delete(peerId);
```

Keep intact:
- All mediasoup handlers (getRouterRtpCapabilities, createWebRtcTransport, connectTransport, produce, consume, resumeConsumer, closeProducer, updateProducerAppData)
- getPeers handler
- e2eKeyExchange handler (used for media E2E, not chat)
- peerJoined/peerLeft events
- All room and peer management logic

Verification:
- Server should start without errors
- No 'sendMessage' or 'messageReceived' events in the file
- No messageTimestamps references in the file
